welcome.title: Welcome to Lunation
welcome.body: Lunation tracks your lunar returns â€” a personal 28-day cycle based on your birth chart. No daily notifications, no anxious predictions.

profile.title: Create Your Profile
profile.body: We calculate your lunar cycles from your birth date and location. This data remains private and is never shared.

consent.title: Your Data Privacy
consent.body: Lunation stores your astrological information locally on your device. No personal data is sold or transmitted to third parties.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Lunation provides monthly symbolic analyses. This content does not replace medical, legal, or professional advice.

slide1.title: ðŸŒ™ Your Monthly Cycle
slide1.body: Each month, the Moon returns to its natal position. This is your lunar return â€” a unique monthly chart.

slide2.title: ðŸŒ‘ Void of Course
slide2.body: Lunar windows where the Moon forms no major aspects. Ideal for observing, not forcing.

slide3.title: ðŸ“… Structured Timeline
slide3.body: Visualize 12 months of upcoming cycles. Prepare for key transits without overwhelm.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.lunarCycleDesc: 1 notification per month at the start of your lunar return
notifications.voidOfCourseDesc: Optional alerts for upcoming VoC windows

noCycles.title: No Lunar Returns Generated
noCycles.body: Generate your next 12 monthly cycles to view your report and timeline.

noVoC.title: No Upcoming Void of Course
noVoC.body: Upcoming VoC windows are not yet calculated. Check back later.

noJournal.title: No Cycle Notes
noJournal.body: Record your weekly observations to better understand your lunar cycles.

network.title: Network Error
network.body: Unable to contact server. Check your internet connection.

notFound.title: Cycle Not Found
notFound.body: The requested cycle does not exist or has not been generated yet.

api.title: Server Error
api.body: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.

newCycle.body: {month} â€” Moon in {sign}, Ascendant {ascendant}. View your monthly report.

vocStart.title: ðŸŒ‘ Void of Course
vocStart.body: Moon enters VoC until {endTime}. Observation window.

vocEnd.title: ðŸŒ‘ VoC Ends in 30 min
vocEnd.body: Moon leaves Void of Course at {endTime}.

journalReminder.title: ðŸŒ™ Weekly Note
journalReminder.body: Week {weekNumber} of your cycle. Record your observations if you wish.

journal.title: Lunar Journal
journal.placeholder: Note your feelings, observations, what stands out today...

medical.title: Medical Disclaimer
medical.body:
Lunation provides monthly symbolic analyses based on astronomical calculations and classical astrological interpretations.

This content is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical, psychological, legal, or financial advice.

If you have concerns about your physical or mental health, consult a qualified healthcare professional. Lunation content should never replace medical diagnosis or treatment.

rgpd.title: Privacy Policy
rgpd.body:
Lunation stores your birth data and preferences locally on your device.

No personal data is transmitted to third parties for commercial purposes.

You can export or delete your data at any time from Settings.

guidance.waxing_crescent: Creative momentum. Lay your first stones.
guidance.waxing_gibbous: Refine your projects. Full light approaches.
guidance.full_moon: Emotional apex. Contemplate what reveals itself.
guidance.waning_gibbous: Active gratitude. Share what has ripened.

emptyState.title: No data available
emptyState.subtitle: Timeline cannot be generated at the moment
